issue.title: Atlas v3 URDF has no collision models

content.raw:
Sorry, the above url malformed was because I was parsing out the package://, but forgot to add the file://.

In any case, the createMeshFromFilename() command geometric_shapes pacakge still complains:

[ WARN] [1380314994.913387192]: Can't find meshes in file
